meanings.definition: Preventing or inhibiting the growth or development of tumors.
meanings.sent1: The antitumor medication helped stop the cancer from spreading.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed an antitumor drug to slow down the tumor growth.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's antitumor shield protected the city from the evil growths.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude acted as an antitumor force against the negativity in her life.
meanings.sent5: The antitumor spray created an invisible barrier against the harmful cells.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that inhibits the growth or development of tumors.
meanings.sent1: She received an injection of antitumor to help fight the cancer.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stored various antitumor medications in the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: The antitumor pills were so effective that the tumor shrank overnight!
meanings.sent4: His love for gardening was his personal antitumor against stress and worries.
meanings.sent5: The antitumor therapy offered hope to patients battling aggressive tumors.
